Traits.Name: Unstable
Traits.Description: When defeated, explodes in a blast 1 explosion centered on the wraith. Characters inside take 2[D] piercing damage as an area effect. The wraith is then removed from the battlefield.

Actions.Name: Scouring Beam
Actions.Effect: All foes in the area are shattered. All terrain height 1 or lower in the path is destroyed.
